title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies: Collaborative Learning Projects for Active Anatomy Education: The Human Body

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent the surface anatomical positions of major internal organs with over 85% accuracy.
Team-based feedback enhances the ability to analyze three or more clinical scenarios linked to palpation techniques.
Using body diagram materials created by learning groups, students can explain anatomical concepts to peers within 10 minutes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
